currencies.name: Etherium Coin
currencies.description: The currency across the shattered kingdoms
currencies.lore: Etherium coins, shimmering metallic discs infused with ethereal energy, the currency of choice in the shattered realms.

currencies.name: Scroll of Wisdom
currencies.lore: An illustrious scroll scribed with the profound insights of the ages, elevating the reader's understanding to new heights

currencies.name: Tome of Enlightment
currencies.lore: A humble tome filled with ancient teachings, granting a modest boon of knowledge to those who study its contents

currencies.name: Codex of Ascendancy
currencies.lore: A refined codex teeming with esoteric knowledge, providing a substantial source of wisdom for the eager seeker

currencies.name: Grimoire of Omniscience
currencies.lore: An unparalleled grimoire emanating with boundless wisdom and arcane revelations, unlocking the full potential of those who delve into its secrets.
